name: Claude Customer Support MeshAgent
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's customer support knowledge work plugin with a nightly docs sync worker
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's customer support knowledge work plugin with a nightly docs sync worker. Agents: claude-customer-support-meshagent (ChatBot), claude-customer-support-meshagent (MailBot), claude-customer-support-meshagent (Worker). Models: gpt-5.2. Images: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/shell-terminal:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz. Skills: customer-research, escalation, knowledge-management, response-drafting, ticket-triage;. Rules: draft-response.md, escalate.md, kb-article.md, research.md, triage.md.
